newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT-PETROBRAS STILL SEEN A BUY.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-PETROBRAS STILL SEEN A BUY.

text.p: Petroleo Brasileiro SA remains a buy, despite Brazil's new Hydrocarbons Law which will end the company's monopoly of the oil sector within three years, broker LatInvest said on Wednesday.

"While the upstream activities of exploration and production and the elimination of an imposed pricing structure are the objects of much attention, downstream activities in refining and transportation will also open up," it said.

LatInvest said Petrobras shares still had upside, despite an 84 percent appreciation so far this year. The concern was trading at a discount of 21 percent to the estimated break-up value of assets after debt of $39 billion.
LatInvest also maintained its rating for Cia Brasileira de Petroleo Ipiranga at "hold". But it downgraded Petrobras Distribuidora SA to "take profits" from "hold" on valuation concerns.
